Intermediate8 hrsBadge: Agent Orchestrator

Agents 101 (Tools & Functions)

Design agents that orchestrate tools safely using function calling and guardrails.

Awarded for shipping a resilient tool-using agent.

Deliverable: Notebook or service with evaluation logs + summary sample.

Capstone

Analyst Assistant

Build an agent that ingests CSV data, runs tool-based insights, and returns an executive summary.
